alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 19 at 1:42PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River at Hailey affecting Blaine County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Big Wood River at Hailey. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.7 feet, or 1199 cfs... Near bankfull from Ketchum down-river to Glendale Road Bridge south of Bellevue. Some lowland seepage and ponding is possible in residential areas near the river especially in the Della View subdivision on far western War Eagle Drive. Gimlet subdivision may experience ponding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM MDT Sunday the stage was 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 3.7 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Wood River Hailey 5.0 4.2 Sun 12 pm MD 4.2 4.0 3.9 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
